title: Concerning a deceptively difficult task
context: Observe that a project looks easy but is actually very hard.

content.bestLine: This project looks simple, but trust me, it's a beast

neutral.text: It's not as easy as it seems
There's more to it than meets the eye
It requires more effort than you think
It's a challenging task, despite its appearance
Don't be fooled by its simplicity

informal.text: This project is a total sleeper
It's way harder than it looks
Don't get too comfortable, it's a tough one
It's a wolf in sheep's clothing
It's not all sunshine and rainbows
It's a tough nut to crack

formal.text: It requires a significant amount of effort
The task is more complex than it initially appears
It demands a high level of dedication
It is not a straightforward task

patterns.template: This project is [options] than it looks

patterns.meaning: The project is more difficult than it appears

lines.speaker: John
lines.text: I don't think this project is going to be that hard

lines.speaker: Emily
lines.text: Trust me, it's a beast. It looks simple, but it's actually very complex

dialogs.description: A manager warning a new employee about a project

lines.speaker: Manager
lines.text: This project may seem easy, but it's actually quite challenging

lines.speaker: New Employee
lines.text: Okay, I'll be careful. What are some potential pitfalls I should watch out for?
